metadata.title: CVE-2024-39894 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: OpenSSH 9.5 through 9.7 before 9.8 sometimes allows timing attacks againstecho-off password entry (e.g., for su and Sudo) because of anObscureKeystrokeTiming logic error. Similarly, other timing attacks againstkeystroke entry could occur.

criterions.comment: openssh package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
openssh-ssh1 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
